metadata.synopsis: The character comments on a note left by the last dawnmaster next to the hidden key in the weapons puzzle. The note cryptically refers to the Blood of Lathander, and catches the Player character's attention.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Tun on Roll Amazing,- On CRE_Main_A go to 74; 24; 81 and pick the lock on the hidden door (S_CRE_WeaponsPuzzle_HiddenDoor)- Read the note in the bag, and close it. The translated string ID of the note is: CRE_WeaponsPuzzle_HastyNote

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This 'blood' sounds important - could it still be here somewhere?
